title: Can i get a refund
body: OK so i wanted to buy the Hearseaker quinn and sweetheart orianna skin today since i got paid today. SO i bought 20 worth of rp soi could buy both. But then i found out that they arent available anymore!! Can i please have my $20 back? I really dont need it if i cant buy the skins i want :(

replies.body: Aww yeah, it looks like the [Heartseeker bundles](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/welcome-heartseeker-game-show) returned to the vault 2 days ago.  :(  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can look into your specific case individually.  Hopefully we can work something out!
